title: KB Home CEO on 'Personalization of the Home'
itunes:title: KB Home CEO on 'Personalization of the Home'
description:
KB Home CEO Jeff Mezger discusses the housing market and how the company creates homes to fit their customer's needs, including designing "flex space."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
